name: JSONParser_getJSONIntValueTest
description: Unit tests for the JSONParser.getJSONIntValue method.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful retrieval of an integer value from a JSON string.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueMissingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to retrieve an integer value using a missing key, expecting a JSONException.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueInvalidJson
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to retrieve an integer value from an invalid JSON string, expecting a JSONException.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueNonIntValue
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to retrieve an integer value from a JSON string where the value is not an integer, expecting a JSONException.
